script.description: Classify file type for easier filtering
script.source: def fileType = ctx.file?.type; if (fileType == null) return; fileType = fileType.toLowerCase(); if (fileType.contains('elf') || fileType.contains('executable')) { ctx.file.classification = 'executable'; } else if (fileType.contains('script') || fileType.contains('python') || fileType.contains('perl') || fileType.contains('shell') || fileType.contains('bash')) { ctx.file.classification = 'script'; } else if (fileType.contains('zip') || fileType.contains('tar') || fileType.contains('gzip') || fileType.contains('archive')) { ctx.file.classification = 'archive'; } else if (fileType.contains('pe32') || fileType.contains('windows') || fileType.contains('dll')) { ctx.file.classification = 'windows_executable'; } else if (fileType.contains('text') || fileType.contains('ascii')) { ctx.file.classification = 'text'; } else { ctx.file.classification = 'other'; }
